title: 3 and Out - All Good with Aaron, Urban's Implosion, Rams/Cards MNF Showdown
itunes:title: 3 and Out - All Good with Aaron, Urban's Implosion, Rams/Cards MNF Showdown
description:
John explains why Aaron Rodgers won't get it better than he's got it in Green Bay, why Urban Meyer has no business questioning the NFL resumes of his assistants, and looks ahead to the huge NFC West Monday Night Football matchup between the Rams and Cardinals. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
